    • parse

      public void parse​(java.lang.String source) throws java.io.IOException
      Parse method accepts string source for WordCloud analysis. Delegates to its parent, abstract class Parser and provides DataSource enum to indicate how to process the source. (More concrete implementation should have been here)
      Specified by:
      parse in interface Parseable
      Specified by:
      parse in class Parser
      Parameters:
      source - - String containing source to a Static URL Complexity: O(1) - Simple method invocation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • sortByWordFrequency

      public java.util.TreeSet<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> sortByWordFrequency​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> frequencyTable, int numberOfWords)
      SortByWordFrequency Abstracts sorting the frequencyTable and assigning to TreeSet to its parent class
      Parameters:
      frequencyTable - - Hashmap that will track words(keys) and their Integer values.
      numberOfWords - - Number of words user wishes to track in their word cloud
      Returns:
      - Returns sorted TreeSet based on frequencyTable and the Supplied EntryComparator Complexity: O(1) - Simple Method Invocation

    • initialiseIgnoreWords

      public void initialiseIgnoreWords​(java.io.File source) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Overloaded method to intialiseIgnoreWords. If user doesn't provide a good path for custom ignorewords.txt file this parameterless overloaded method is instead invoked and the default ignorewords.txt used Complexity: O(1) - Assigning file to known value and simple method invocation
      Specified by:
      initialiseIgnoreWords in class Parser
      Parameters:
      source - - File containing common words to ignore
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
      java.io.IOException
